value: With the addition of the SAT high school exam this year, all Illinois public school students are now being evaluated against relatively high standards. The percentage of Illinois students passing state elementary and high school exams now alligns with Illinois' performance on NAEP, a rigorous national exam known as the Nation's Report Card.
Scores reflect performance on the English/language arts portion of each test. PARCC and NAEP results are for eighth graders; SAT results are for 11th graders.
Illinois State Board of Education and National Assessment of Educational Progress
percent of students in Illinois meeting expectations.
